distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gstreamer-0_10-plugins-base fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2017-5837: Fixed a floating point exception in gst_riff_create_audio_caps (bsc#1024076).
- CVE-2017-5844: Fixed a floating point exception in gst_riff_create_audio_caps (bsc#1024079).
- CVE-2019-9928: Fixed a heap-based overflow in the rtsp connection parser (bsc#1133375).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The gst_riff_create_audio_caps function in gst-libs/gst/riff/riff-media.c in gst-plugins-base in GStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (floating point exception and crash) via a crafted video file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: The gst_riff_create_audio_caps function in gst-libs/gst/riff/riff-media.c in gst-plugins-base in GStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (floating point exception and crash) via a crafted ASF file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: GStreamer before 1.16.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow in the RTSP connection parser via a crafted response from a server, potentially allowing remote code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
